pages.text: $(l)Core: Obsidian Generator$() represents a device that automatically collect lava and touch water to form obsidians. $(br2)Place an obsidian upon using. $(br2)Cannot be put in automatic collector since it can only place and cannot break. Please refer to $(l:3_technical_cores/obsidian_generator_automated)Core: Obsidian Generator (automated)$()  for automatically generating obsidians.
